content.question: Which of the following most directly challenged the conservative order established at the Congress of Vienna?

choices.label: The Protestant religious revival associated with Methodism
The spread of nationalism to areas such as Germany
The development of industrial modernization programs such as Russiaâ€™s
The continued dominance of agricultural elites in eastern and southern Europe

content.answer: The spread of nationalism to areas such as Germany

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
